name: Lost Alliance
description:
Lost Alliance is a First Person Shooter Game in which the player is tasked with finding there way around a large map where they can find various weapons, Voice acting isn't great at the moment as we are still looking for some people to help us out with that but for the moment we have a few of my friends standing in (Sorry for the ear-rape)

The Screenshot were Taken at Medium Graphical Settings As My Computer Starts to die a little bit, Apologies for the inconvenience but to be fair if my PC Dies then there isnt any game :D
